topic.topic_name: Movement into and out of cells

core.description: Describe active transport as the movement of particles through a cell membrane from a region of lower concentration to a region of higher concentration (i.e. against a concentration gradient), using energy from respiration

supplement.description: Explain the importance of active transport as a process for movement of molecules or ions across membranes, including ion uptake by root hairs
State that protein carriers move molecules or ions across a membrane during active transport
